diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Burst fracture of the twelfth thoracic vertebra with incomplete spinal cord injury
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with worsening back pain, lower extremity weakness, and neurological deficits after a fall. MRI confirmed a burst fracture at the T12 vertebra with retropulsion of a fragment into the spinal canal. Due to the progressive neurologic deficit and signs of spinal cord compression, surgical intervention was selected as the most appropriate treatment.
